notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: A.V.V.d.S. was responsible for the plant collection, interpreted the results and drafted the manuscript. U.S.d.S., J.R.d.S.C., and B.D.R.B were responsible for the preparation of the material and extraction of the essential oil. K.M.C and T.H.S.R. were responsible for the chemical analysis of the essential oil. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
